inclusion.criterion: Postmenopausal status (amenorrhea for at least 12 months)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Application of estrogen or cyclic estrogen/progestin preparation other than the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: medication for at least 6 months prior to Visit 1
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Uterine bleeding of unknown etiology within the last 2 years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous or existing or suspected carcinoma of the breast
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Hashimoto disease, but it does not seem to be a contraindication for this trial. However, her high TSH levels and low free T4 levels may require further evaluation.
